alert.note: Alert for Malheur (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 1:39PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PDT/545 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast Oregon, including the following counties, in northeast Oregon, Baker. In southeast Oregon, Malheur. * WHEN...Until 445 PM PDT /545 PM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding has been reported over highway 26 east of Unity. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 139 PM PDT /239 PM MDT/, the public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Unity, Unity Dam and Unity Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
